name: Gimmiko
storyline: One night a year, all cats on earth stand on their hind legs and beckon the moon to come closer. Shadowblighted, it pierces through the sky, freezing the world in a time warp of terror. Monsters from all kinds of cultures, folklores and movies are leaking from the common subconcious and into reality. It's up to the guardians of Gimmick Temple to save the world from this ghastly curse!
summary: The world is frozen in an endless night, trapped under a shadowblighted moon. Demons from the collective subconcious are leaking into reality. Save the world from the curse of the Jabberwock in this wacky dicebuilding roguelite!
